loadDefaults

  • loadDefaults(defaults: Iterable<[string, string]>): Currencies
    • Defined in src/index.ts:28

    If currency value is equal to currency code it will use entries. E.g: MMK -> Myanmar Kiats is not available in Intl.NumberFormat for Android so you will get "MMK" value instead of "Myanmar Kiats". If you want to set default values for this case, you can load them using this method: loadDefaults([['MMK', 'A value to show']]).

    Parameters

    • defaults: Iterable<[string, string]>

      Pairs from currency code to currency value (symbol or name).

    Returns Currencies

    current instance
